infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_o2station: At the OxyGear® Refilling-Station, 6 oxygen tanks can be refilled or stored at the same time.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_divsuitlocker: In this lockable OxyGear® special locker you can store a ready-to-use diving suit.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_locker: In this lockable OxyGear® locker you can store small and medium-sized objects. The content is protected from fire and water.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_supplies: This wall-mounted and lockable OxyGear® storage container can be used to store small and medium-sized objects. The content is protected from fire and water.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_wall-fabricato: This compact fabricator version from OxyGear® has a wall mount and ID card recognition.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_navterminal: Despite its compact design, this OxyGear® control and navigation terminal offers a total of 6 freely assignable signal outputs.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_statusmonitor: This OxyGear® status monitor enables the status of the submarine to be monitored.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_cargo: This lockable OxyGear® cargo storage can be used to store cargo boxes and ammunition. The content is protected from fire and water.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_buzzer: This OxyGear® alarm buzzer generates an acoustic signal.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_weaponholder: The OxyGear® weapon holder allows quick access to the inserted weapon. The integrated RFID only releases the weapon with a valid ID card.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_floodlight: This OxyGear® high-performance floodlight with LED technology generates a wide beam of light with a power consumption of 1000 watts.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_textpanel: This OxyGear® panel with LED technology can display any text and color.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_chair: This OxyGear® half bucket seat provides optimal grip at high G-forces.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_stool: This OxyGear® stool provides good grip thanks to its special coating even at medium G-forces.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_engine: The Avalanche™ high-performance drive from OxyGear® has an output of 3000 KW and is very efficient. However, it requires shorter maintenance intervals.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_bumper: The OxyGear® impact damper has a ceramic core, which is encased in composite plastic.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_lightbox: An OxyGear® light box with wall mount.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_floorlight: OxyGear® lighting with indirect light and wall mount.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_frontlight: An OxyGear® headlamp for outdoor use.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_glass: This OxyGear® special glass consists of quartz sand which was produced in connection with colorless crystals of the chemical boron oxide. That makes this material particularly resistant.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_glass_base: These OxyGear® bases are installed in connection with the glass elements. They are made of aluminum which, with the addition of magnesium, has been given increased resistance.
infotexts.entityname.oxygear_modernhull: OxyGear Hull Element made of High-Performance Thermoplastic
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_modernhull: This OxyGear® hull element was largely made of high-performance thermoplastics and is particularly robust.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_coilgunloader: This OxyGear® loader with dual ammunition feed system enables ammunition to be fed from two containers at the same time.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_railgunloader: This OxyGear® loader with quadruple ammunition storage and feed system enables four Railgun-grenades to be loaded and reloaded one after the other.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_supercapacitor: This OxyGear® ultracapacitor uses organic electrolytes, which allow a higher operating voltage and do not freeze prematurely at low temperatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_coilgun: This OxyGear® rapid-fire Gaussian gun accelerates steel projectiles with electromagnets using current-carrying coils to a high velocity.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_periscope: This OxyGear® periscope is used to control monitoring equipment and on-board armament via electrical signals.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_batteryloader: This OxyGear® charging station can charge up to 4 batteries at the same time.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_comhub: This OxyGear® Command-Hub is used to organize and control signals and power lines.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_oxygenerator: This OxyGear® oxygen generator is more compact than the competition models due to the use of the latest technology.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_hybridpump: This fully automatic OxyGear® hybrid pump activates itself automatically when it comes into contact with water and has an integrated water sensor with a signal output.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_pump: This OxyGear® bilge pump has been designed for use in air locks and can be used in many ways.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_divingsuit: This OxyGear® diving suit has been reinforced to withstand the immense pressure in the deeper regions of Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_scooter: The OxyGear® underwater scooter, model Schnitter™ convinces with outstanding speed, but at the expense of battery power. The Schnitter™ model can also be used in emergencies to ward off aggressive creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_transportbox: This OxyGear® salvage container is designed for outdoor use and allows the simultaneous transport of 6 pieces of bulky equipment. The container is waterproof, fire-resistant and has a signal lighting.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_bandagebag: This OxyGear® bandage bag offers space for 20 bandages and Plastomed-bandages. The bandage bag is made of a fire-resistant silica gel-glass fiber combination.
infotexts.entitydescription.oxygear_ammobag: This OxyGear® ammunition bag offers space for 24 rounds of ammunition or magazines. The ammunition bag is made of a fire-resistant silica gel-glass fiber combination.
